feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.0
entry.content:
• 🔒 Added escaping to member export CSV fields - Daniel Lockyer
  • 🐛 Fixed jerky scrolling in Site Design for Safari (#19974) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.81.1...v5.82.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.1
entry.content:
• 🎨 Improved post-setup onboarding flow (#19996) - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed Gscan type error crashing settings (#19994) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.82.0...v5.82.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.2
entry.content:
• 🎨 Updated Source to v1.2.2 - Ghost CI
  • 🎨 Updated Casper to v5.7.2 - Ghost CI
  • 🐛 Fixed First Promoter always showing Active (#20010) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.82.1...v5.82.2

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.3
entry.content:
• 🎨 Changed TK reminders to be case-insensitive (#20024) - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed admin error when deleting an unsaved or imported post (#20053) - Chris Raible
  • 🐛 Fixed file card button not being linked in emails (#20023) - renovate[bot]
  • ℹ️ Added support for Node 20 - please report any issues with Node 20 support to GitHub.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.82.2...v5.82.3

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.82.4
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.82.3...v5.82.4
